CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc East Rovers?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc East Rovers is arc {Eddiehaven Panthers}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Eddiehaven Panthers?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Eddiehaven Panthers is arc {East Rovers}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {South Stars} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Edwardsborough Bulls} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from South Stars to Eddiehaven Panthers in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from East Rovers to Eddiehaven Panthers in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from East Rovers to South Stars in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Eddiehaven Panthers and East Rovers in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Eddiehaven Panthers and East Rovers is {148}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Eddiehaven Panthers and Edwardsborough Bulls in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Eddiehaven Panthers and Edwardsborough Bulls is {104}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Eddiehaven Panthers?
SC.A: The total flow output from Eddiehaven Panthers is {322}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Eddiehaven Panthers?
SC.A: The total flow input by Eddiehaven Panthers is {346}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 788? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1055} from {South Stars} to {Edwardsborough Bulls}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 89? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {85} from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {South Stars}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 138 and 181? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {170} from {East Rovers} to {South Stars}, a flow of {148} from {East Rovers} to {Eddiehaven Panthers}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from South Stars to East Rovers or from Edwardsborough Bulls to Poolechester Dynasty?
NC.A: The flow from {Edwardsborough Bulls} to {Poolechester Dynasty} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Eddiehaven Panthers to South Stars, from East Rovers to South Stars, or from Edwardsborough Bulls to Eddiehaven Panthers?
NC.A: The flow from {East Rovers} to {South Stars} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {South Stars}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Edwardsborough Bulls} and {South Stars}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Poolechester Dynasty, Arc Edwardsborough Bulls, Arc South Stars, Arc Eddiehaven Panthers, Arc East Rovers}.
